page.title: 09LOCAL BUSINESSES
page.content: Apart from the shops and garage there are four main businesses in the village. The maltings used to malt barley ready for making beer or whisky and lorries used to take it to different parts of the country or to Felistowe docks,. Now the maltings is only used for storing barley as the maltings part of it has closed down. Lorries bring the barley from the farms around about and it is stored in the big silos. The second business is Galloways. It is a bus station and has lots of buses but it also has coaches. It runs a regular bus service to places like Stowmarket and Ipwich. I also has school buses to take the children to the Middle School and High School in Bacton and Stowupland. The firm organises coach trips to different places and near Christmas there is a
